snippet.title: Black Future '88 - Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
GREENLIGHT: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=859926785

Welcome to the retro future, where the technology is amazing but always breaks and misfires. Black Future '88 is a brutal cyberpunk platformer where players must climb a procedural tower to kill it's insane owner. Collect massively overpowered buffs and 100+ weapons to combat overwhelming enemies, and eventually die... horribly. You must balance your own curse stat and choose what you should leave behind as the tower will strengthen itself with items left on the ground. Original soundtrack by Tremor Low. 

Available late 2017 in Early Access.

Sign up here to be notified when the demo is available:
blackfuture88.com
